attributes.action: Have Gender-Neutral bathrooms in all schools around the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Please install gender neutral bathrooms in respect of all students / teachers who do not identify as either. It is an everyday struggle for these people and they deserve to feel as safe, comfortable, and respected as cisgender people do and they deserve the same rights. Thank you, please consider.
attributes.background: I would like Gender-Neutral bathrooms in schools all around the UK. People who do not identify as female or male (for example Non-Binary, Gender-Fluid) do not feel comfortable or safe using either female or male bathrooms and it’s not at all fair.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302997
